Name: Axiom
Natural: The Axiom Overhead Dust System provides complete mounting hardware, flex-hose, and hose clamps to simplify connecting the ADS220 dust shoe to Axiom CNC routers, ensuring efficient dust collection with minimum 500 CFM airflow.

Name: Rockwell
Natural: The Rockwell 10pc T-Shank Blade Set offers versatile replacements for BladeRunner X2, enabling fast blade swaps without tools, ideal for cutting wood, metal, tile, and plastic with smooth or scroll finishes.

Name: WEN
Natural: The WEN 15-Amp Variable Speed Plunge Router offers 8,000–23,000 RPM, 1/4 and 1/2-inch bit compatibility, macro/micro adjustment, and comes with a hard case and accessories, ideal for intricate and versatile woodworking.

Name: SKIL
Natural: The SKIL 10 Amp Fixed Base Router features 6-speed control, LED work lighting, and ergonomic handles, while the SKIL Router Table SRT1039 offers a router lift and onboard bit storage, perfect for efficient home workshops.

Name: RIDGID
Natural: The RIDGID 1-1/2 HP Compact Router features soft start, variable speed, and micro-adjust dial for precision depth control, offering reliability and versatility for detailed routing tasks.

Name: Milwaukee
Natural: The Milwaukee M18 FUEL Compact Router delivers 31,000 RPM with a POWERSTATE Brushless Motor, cordless performance matching 1.25 HP corded routers, featuring micro and macro depth adjustments and dual LED lighting.

Name: Makita
Natural: The Makita RT0701C Compact Router offers 1-1/4 HP with variable speed (10,000–30,000 RPM), smooth rack-and-pinion depth adjustment, and a slim ergonomic body, built for precision and durability.

Name: Bosch
Natural: The Bosch MRF23EVS 2.3 HP Fixed-Base Router features a trigger-controlled handle, 15 Amp motor, Constant Response circuitry, and microfine depth adjustment, perfect for heavy-duty, precise woodworking projects.
